anchortarget.fieldDescription: This field must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
anchortarget.name: ./anchortarget

upsellTitle.fieldDescription: Upsell Title, e.g. Don't have a myEDC account?
upsellTitle.name: ./upsellTitle

upsellDesc.fieldDescription: Upsell Description, e.g. Register to get access...
upsellDesc.name: ./upsellDesc

upsellCtaText.fieldDescription: Upsell Button Text, e.g. Register Now
upsellCtaText.name: ./upsellCtaText

upsellOptLinkText.fieldDescription: Optional link Text, e.g. Sign In, if no text entered link will not display
upsellOptLinkText.name: ./upsellOptLinkText

upsellOptLinkUrl.fieldDescription: Optional link, if empty, a Sign In link will be generated automatically
upsellOptLinkUrl.name: ./upsellOptLinkUrl

upsellTitleL5.fieldDescription: Upsell Title, e.g. Already have a MyEDC account?
upsellTitleL5.name: ./upsellTitleL5

upsellDescL5.fieldDescription: Upsell Description, e.g. Sign in now to get your one-click access....
upsellDescL5.name: ./upsellDescL5

upsellCtaTextL5.fieldDescription: Upsell Button Text, e.g. Sign In
upsellCtaTextL5.name: ./upsellCtaTextL5
